title: ‘Sad and frustrated’: CNN staff fear sweeping layoffs by March
content: CNN employees are bracing for budget cuts and layoffs by March as the network undergoes a business model overhaul. CEO Mark Thompson acknowledges industry challenges and hints at potential cuts, particularly impacting New York City productions. CNN's viewership struggles, notably during election coverage, have fueled concerns about its future direction and impact on talent retention.
summary: CNN employees are bracing for budget cuts and layoffs by March as the network undergoes a business model overhaul. CEO Mark Thompson acknowledges industry challenges and hints at potential cuts, particularly impacting New York City productions. CNN's viewership struggles, notably during election coverage, have fueled concerns about its future direction and impact on talent retention.

title: Chinese military activity near Taiwan intensifies, 24 PLA aircraft detected
content: Taiwan's ministry of national defence detected 24 Chinese aircraft and 6 naval vessels near its territory, with 15 of the aircraft crossing the median line of the Taiwan Strait. This follows a similar incident the previous day. Taiwan's President convened a security meeting, reaffirming their commitment to national security amidst heightened tensions stemming from China's increased military activities.
summary: Taiwan's ministry of national defence detected 24 Chinese aircraft and 6 naval vessels near its territory, with 15 of the aircraft crossing the median line of the Taiwan Strait. This follows a similar incident the previous day.  Taiwan's President convened a security meeting, reaffirming their commitment to national security amidst heightened tensions stemming from China's increased military activities.

title: Day after Brampton temple cancels event, Canada police say 'no direct threats' received against places of worship
content: Despite heightened community concerns, Peel Regional Police have assured the public that no direct threats have been made against places of worship. This follows the cancellation of a consular camp at Brampton's Triveni Mandir due to security concerns, prompting calls for increased protection for Hindu Canadians.
summary: Despite heightened community concerns, Peel Regional Police have assured the public that no direct threats have been made against places of worship. This follows the cancellation of a consular camp at Brampton's Triveni Mandir due to security concerns, prompting calls for increased protection for Hindu Canadians.

title: 'These things always take time': Queen Camilla on mend after chest infection
content: Queen Camilla, in her first appearance since November 5th, provided an update on her recovery from a chest infection. Attending a reception for The Booker Prize Foundation at Clarence House, she acknowledged still experiencing some coughing but expressed her determination to attend the event. Camilla, a longtime supporter of the prize, emphasized her improving health while conversing with attendees.
summary: Queen Camilla, in her first appearance since November 5th, provided an update on her recovery from a chest infection.  Attending a reception for The Booker Prize Foundation at Clarence House, she acknowledged still experiencing some coughing but expressed her determination to attend the event.  Camilla, a longtime supporter of the prize, emphasized her improving health while conversing with attendees.

title: Trump cabinet 2.0: Full list of key appointments including Musk, Ramaswamy, Ratcliffe
content: President-elect Donald Trump is assembling his administration for his second term, prioritizing loyalty from his 2024 campaign. Notable appointments include Elon Musk and Vivek Ramaswamy to streamline government, John Ratcliffe's return as CIA director, and prominent roles for Mike Huckabee, Pete Hegseth, and others reflecting Trump's policy agenda.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump is assembling his administration for his second term, prioritizing loyalty from his 2024 campaign. Notable appointments include Elon Musk and Vivek Ramaswamy to streamline government, John Ratcliffe's return as CIA director, and prominent roles for Mike Huckabee, Pete Hegseth, and others reflecting Trump's policy agenda.

title: Trump is raiding House of Representatives for cabinet posts, threatening to cut into a likely razor-thin majority
content: Incoming US President Trump's cabinet picks are causing ripples in the House of Representatives, potentially shrinking the already slim Republican majority. With Representatives Waltz and Stefanik tapped for key roles, and Senator Rubio poised to become Secretary of State, special elections will be needed to fill the vacancies.
summary: Incoming US President Trump's cabinet picks are causing ripples in the House of Representatives, potentially shrinking the already slim Republican majority. With Representatives Waltz and Stefanik tapped for key roles, and Senator Rubio poised to become Secretary of State, special elections will be needed to fill the vacancies.

title: China pushing to deploy its own security staff to protect citizens in Pak: Report
content: Following a deadly bombing in Karachi that killed two Chinese engineers, China is urging Pakistan to enhance security measures for its citizens working in the country. Beijing has proposed a joint security management system, including the potential deployment of Chinese security forces on Pakistani soil.
summary: Following a deadly bombing in Karachi that killed two Chinese engineers, China is urging Pakistan to enhance security measures for its citizens working in the country. Beijing has proposed a joint security management system, including the potential deployment of Chinese security forces on Pakistani soil.

title: Donald Trump selects real estate tycoon Steven Witkoff as Middle East envoy
content: President-elect Donald Trump has appointed Steven C Witkoff, a prominent real estate investor and philanthropist, as Special Envoy to the Middle East. Witkoff, with a successful track record in property development and a history of leadership in various organizations, has been tasked with promoting stability and peace in the region.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump has appointed Steven C Witkoff, a prominent real estate investor and philanthropist, as Special Envoy to the Middle East. Witkoff, with a successful track record in property development and a history of leadership in various organizations, has been tasked with promoting stability and peace in the region.

title: Donald Trump taps John Ratcliffe, his former intelligence director, for CIA chief; calls him 'fearless fighter'
content: Former Director of National Intelligence, John Ratcliffe, has been appointed by Donald Trump to lead the Central Intelligence Agency (CIA). Trump praised Ratcliffe's commitment to truth and honesty, citing his role in exposing alleged misinformation regarding Russian collusion and Hunter Biden's laptop. Ratcliffe's previous experience and accolades, including the National Security Medal, make him the first to hold both esteemed intelligence positions.
summary: Former Director of National Intelligence, John Ratcliffe, has been appointed by Donald Trump to lead the Central Intelligence Agency (CIA). Trump praised Ratcliffe's commitment to truth and honesty, citing his role in exposing alleged misinformation regarding Russian collusion and Hunter Biden's laptop. Ratcliffe's previous experience and accolades, including the National Security Medal, make him the first to hold both esteemed intelligence positions.

title: Melania Trump's 'I am the most bullied person' video viral as she 'rejects' Jill Biden's tea invite
content: In a 2018 ABC interview, Melania Trump said she thought she was the most bullied person, one of the most bullied persons in the world. The clip resurfaced and went viral as Melania's reported rejection of Jill Biden's invitation for tea Wednesday came under scrutiny. Melania will be more absent this time than earlier as she declined even the first formality, it is being speculated.
summary: In a 2018 ABC interview, Melania Trump said she thought she was the most bullied person, one of the most bullied persons in the world. The clip resurfaced and went viral as Melania's reported rejection of Jill Biden's invitation for tea Wednesday came under scrutiny. Melania will be more absent this time than earlier as she declined even the first formality, it is being speculated.

title: Trump announces Mike Huckabee as ambassador to Israel: 'He loves...'
content: "Mike has been a great public servant, Governor, and Leader in Faith for many years. He loves Israel, and the people of Israel, and likewise, the people of Israel love him. Mike will work tirelessly to bring about Peace in the Middle East!" Donald Trump posted on Truth Social announcing his latest appointment.
summary: "Mike has been a great public servant, Governor, and Leader in Faith for many years. He loves Israel, and the people of Israel, and likewise, the people of Israel love him. Mike will work tirelessly to bring about Peace in the Middle East!" Donald Trump posted on Truth Social announcing his latest appointment.

title: Trump taking Vivek Ramaswamy, Charlie Kirk's advice on staff selection: 'Not only Elon Musk'
content: It was Trump Jr who shot down any discussion of Mike Pompeo or Nikki Haley for any official roles as he made it clear that his father would only take loyalists as his staff. "Trump's transition co-chairs are Lutnick and Linda McMahon, but there are Elon Musk, Vice President-elect JD Vance, Donald Trump Jr, Tulsi Gabbard, Kennedy. There’s also a rotating cast of conservative influencers like Charlie Kirk and Vivek Ramaswamy, according to four people with knowledge of the meetings," Politico reported.
summary: It was Trump Jr who shot down any discussion of Mike Pompeo or Nikki Haley for any official roles as he made it clear that his father would only take loyalists as his staff. "Trump's transition co-chairs are Lutnick and Linda McMahon, but there are Elon Musk, Vice President-elect JD Vance, Donald Trump Jr, Tulsi Gabbard, Kennedy. There’s also a rotating cast of conservative influencers like Charlie Kirk and Vivek Ramaswamy, according to four people with knowledge of the meetings," Politico reported.

title: Archbishop of Canterbury, Trump critic Justin Welby resigns. What is the sex abuse scandal?
content: Archbishop of Canterbury Justin Welby announced his resignation amid mounting pressure over his handling of sexual abuse allegations. The scandal involves late John Smyth, who was accused of abusing numerous boys over decades. Welby, who also presided over Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's wedding and King Charles III's coronation, expressed remorse for his inaction.
summary: Archbishop of Canterbury Justin Welby announced his resignation amid mounting pressure over his handling of sexual abuse allegations. The scandal involves late John Smyth, who was accused of abusing numerous boys over decades. Welby, who also presided over Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's wedding and King Charles III's coronation, expressed remorse for his inaction.

title: Severe turbulence injures 11 on Lufthansa flight from Buenos Aires to Frankfurt
Trump's project 2025 aims to dismantle department of education with Musk’s backing in plan for schools
Did Kamala Harris and Jill Biden ignore each other in viral video? Watch
content: It is not a secret that both Joe Biden and Jill held a grudge when the outgoing president was made to drop out of the presidential election. It was a decision dominated by the party veterans and Biden had no other option than to abide by endorsing Kamala Harris. Jill Biden too campaigned for Kamala Harris but the Bidens did not let go of the grudge.
summary: It is not a secret that both Joe Biden and Jill held a grudge when the outgoing president was made to drop out of the presidential election. It was a decision dominated by the party veterans and Biden had no other option than to abide by endorsing Kamala Harris. Jill Biden too campaigned for Kamala Harris but the Bidens did not let go of the grudge.

title: Donald Trump Jr hints at major action on Diddy; seeks the whole list of party attendees
content: Donald Trump Jr. suggested that his father's administration would take a strong stance on sex trafficking allegations against rapper P. Diddy. This comes after a report surfaced alleging the presence of minors at Diddy's private parties known as "Freak-Offs," where sexual misconduct was alleged to have taken place. "We want the whole list of who was there. Sunlight is the best disinfectant!!" he posted.
summary: Donald Trump Jr. suggested that his father's administration would take a strong stance on sex trafficking allegations against rapper P. Diddy. This comes after a report surfaced alleging the presence of minors at Diddy's private parties known as "Freak-Offs," where sexual misconduct was alleged to have taken place. "We want the whole list of who was there. Sunlight is the best disinfectant!!" he posted.

title: Saudi crown prince condemns Israel’s ‘genocide' against Palestinians, warns against military action in Iran
Laura Loomer attacks AOC, asks if she'd admit her pregnancy or wait till 9th month to...
content: Far-right activist Laura Loomer has reignited pregnancy rumors about Democratic Representative Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez following the election. Loomer publicly questioned if AOC would now address the rumors, which she had also circulated before the election. "Hey @AOC The election is over. You can come out and finally admit you're pregnant. Or are you waiting till the 9th month to abort? The election is over, cupcake?" Laura Loomer posted.
summary: Far-right activist Laura Loomer has reignited pregnancy rumors about Democratic Representative Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez following the election. Loomer publicly questioned if AOC would now address the rumors, which she had also circulated before the election. "Hey @AOC The election is over. You can come out and finally admit you're pregnant. Or are you waiting till the 9th month to abort? The election is over, cupcake?" Laura Loomer posted.

title: Is Elon Musk still at Mar-a-Lago, dining and playing golf with Donald Trump?
content: Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago mansion is teeming with two kinds of people now -- one those who are looking for jobs at the new Trump administration and the second are those who are looking to influence Trump on those picks. And Elon Musk has been looming over all of that. He may not have a direct role inside the administration as that would be complicated for all the companies that he owns but he probably does not need one as he has much influence from outside.
summary: Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago mansion is teeming with two kinds of people now -- one those who are looking for jobs at the new Trump administration and the second are those who are looking to influence Trump on those picks. And Elon Musk has been looming over all of that. He may not have a direct role inside the administration as that would be complicated for all the companies that he owns but he probably does not need one as he has much influence from outside.
